title: FragPunk Tier List
description: Explore our comprehensive FragPunk tier list as of March 2025, categorizing all Lancers from S to C Tier with detailed descriptions to help you choose the best characters for your gameplay.
heading: FragPunk Tier List
introText: Explore our comprehensive FragPunk tier list as of March 2025, categorizing all Lancers from S to C Tier with detailed descriptions to help you choose the best characters for your gameplay.

data.itemDescription: A versatile Lancer with a diverse skill set. Kismet's abilities encompass Hello, Goodbye, a frontal scan revealing nearby enemies; Misery Angel, a bomb that ignores barricades; and Walk on the Wild Side, allowing temporary invisibility and invulnerability

A supportive Lancer with abilities centered around healing and area control. Pathojen's skill set comprises Emotional Rescue, a throwable that heals all allies in range; Shroom Wall, a destructible fungus wall providing cover; and Killer Queen, a trap dealing damage over time

An agile attacker with abilities tailored for swift engagements. Corona's skill set includes Fast Lane, a quick dash; Ashes to Ashes, a throwable causing minor damage over time while providing self-buffs; and Hothead, which blinds all enemies in line of sight

A demolition expert with a focus on explosive damage. Broker's abilities include Goddardâ€™s Vengeance, a shoulder-mounted rocket launcher with high explosive damage; Smokestack Lightning, a throwable smoke screen for stealth; and Cherry Bomb, a throwable that generates multiple energy bombs upon impact

A stealth-focused Lancer excelling in surprise attacks. Zephyr's abilities include Midnight Rambler, offering full or semi-invisibility limited to melee use; Fade Away, marking an area for full invisibility with Midnight Rambler; and Dagger Beacon, a dagger that can be teleported to, enabling swift repositioning

A strategic Lancer adept at disrupting enemy formations. Serket's abilities feature Station to Station, placing beacons for teleportation; Gold Dust Woman, a dust tornado that binds and slows enemies; and Dilemma, a throwable that pulls enemies toward it

An effective sniper specializing in long-range eliminations. Hollowpoint's abilities include One Last Kiss, deploying a single-shot sniper rifle that reveals enemies when aiming down sights; Smoke Screen, a forward-moving smoke screen; and Paparazzi, a trap that exposes enemies and can be retrieved

A tactical Lancer with abilities focused on mobility and enemy displacement. Spider's skill set includes Teleporter, facilitating quick repositioning; Spirited Away, relocating enemies unexpectedly; and Spider Web, impairing foes' movements

An aggressive Lancer with abilities enhancing close-quarters combat. Axon's skill set features Sticky Fingers, throwing bouncy grenades that explode upon contact; Electric Guitar, deploying two sticky bombs that recharge upon securing eliminations; and Super Freak, granting immunity to visual disturbances

A defensive specialist utilizing electrical traps. Jaguar's abilities encompass Live Wire, an electric shock dealing damage and slowing enemies; Electric Avenue, deploying electric cages around enemies; and I Can See for Miles, displaying the number and direction of enemies, detecting low-health foes

An engineer-type Lancer specializing in deployable gadgets. Nitro's abilities feature Chug Chug, a tactical remote combat drone; The Wall, a three-piece shield providing cover; and Mr. PewPew, an automatic sentry turret for area denial
Details about Chum's abilities and role are currently limited, placing them in the

An exceptional Lancer proficient in both offensive and defensive roles. Sonar's abilities include Echolocation, which reveals enemy positions; Sonic Surge, offering crowd control; and Sound of Silence, which muffles team movements, facilitating stealthy approaches
